remarks: The span of a pair of vectors equals the sum of the spans of their singletons.  (Contributed by NM, 13-Jan-2015.)
statement:
lsmpr.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lsmpr.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lsmpr.p $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` W ) $.
lsmpr.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) $.
lsmpr.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
lsmpr.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
lsmpr $p |- ( ph -> ( N ` { X , Y } ) = ( ( N ` { X } ) .(+) ( N ` { Y } ) ) ) $.
